title: Beetroot Salad Recipe (with Feta & Pear)
summary: Beetroot Salad Recipe (with Feta & Pear) is a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian main course. For $4.22 per serving, this recipe covers 24% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe makes 2 servings with 481 calories, 18g of protein, and 22g of fat each. If you have you could use apples, sea salt and pepper, optional an of sunflower seeds, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the mint you could follow this main course with the Mint Brownies as a dessert. This recipe from Jamie Oliver has 239 fans. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 82%. This score is great. Similar recipes include Dinner Tonight: Crunchy Raw Beetroot Salad with Fetan and Pear, Roasted Pear, Feta, Watercress And Hazelnut Salad Recipe, and Beetroot Feta Salad.
